import React from "react"; import '../css/Popup.css' import spotify from '../img/icon-link/' export function Popup({ isOpen, onClose, items, title }) { if (!isOpen) return null; return (
e.stopPropagation()}>
{title}
{items.length > 0 ? ( items.map((item) => (

{item.eventType}

{item.eventName}

Go to Event
)) ) : (

No events available

)}
); }
